_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: Gravit LaunchServer
author: support@meproject.ru

installation.script:
#!/bin/ash
# Gravit LaunchServer installation script
# Made by rkkm, MeProject team.
#
# Server files: /mnt/server

apk add --no-cache curl unzip

if [ ! -d /mnt/server ]; then
    mkdir /mnt/server/
fi

cd /mnt/server/

echo "Downloading LaunchServer"
echo "NOTE: Modules will be downloaded but will NOT be installed"
sleep 3
s_version=${SERVER_VERSION}
if [ "$s_version" = "latest" ]; then s_version=$(curl --silent "https://api.github.com/repos/GravitLauncher/Launcher/releases/latest" | grep '"tag_name":' | sed -E 's/.*"([^"]+)".*/\1/' | cut -c2-); fi

curl -L https://github.com/GravitLauncher/Launcher/releases/download/v${s_version}/LaunchServer.jar --output LaunchServer.jar 
curl -L https://github.com/GravitLauncher/Launcher/releases/download/v${s_version}/ServerWrapper.jar --output ServerWrapper.jar
curl -L https://github.com/GravitLauncher/Launcher/releases/download/v${s_version}/libraries.zip --output libraries.zip
curl -L https://github.com/GravitLauncher/Launcher/releases/download/v${s_version}/LaunchServerModules.zip --output LaunchServerModules.zip
curl -L https://github.com/GravitLauncher/Launcher/releases/download/v${s_version}/LauncherModules.zip --output LauncherModules.zip
unzip -o libraries.zip
rm libraries.zip

downloading_r=${SHOULD_DOWNLOAD_RUNTIME}
if [ $downloading_r ]; then
    echo "Donwloading Runtime"
    echo "NOTE: Modules will be downloaded but will NOT be installed"
    echo "NOTE: Default runtime will be downloaded. Don't forget to replace it with your version"
    sleep 5
    r_version=${RUNTIME_VERSION}
    if [ "$r_version" = "latest" ]; then r_version=$(curl --silent "https://api.github.com/repos/GravitLauncher/LauncherRuntime/releases/latest" | grep '"tag_name":' | sed -E 's/.*"([^"]+)".*/\1/' | cut -c2-); fi

    curl -L https://github.com/GravitLauncher/LauncherRuntime/releases/download/v${r_version}/JavaRuntime_lmodule.jar --output JavaRuntime-${r_version}.jar 
    curl -L https://github.com/GravitLauncher/LauncherRuntime/releases/download/v${r_version}/runtime.zip --output runtime.zip
    mkdir -p runtime/
    unzip -o runtime.zip -d runtime/
    rm runtime.zip
fi

echo "Done!"

variables.name: Gravit Runtime Version
variables.description: Version of Gravit Runtime to install

variables.name: Download Runtime
variables.description: Should we download Runtime when installing LaunchServer. RUNTIME_VERSION will be used as version
